resources.string: please restore a currency at least
Password is important , otherwise you can not trade
Please enter the mnemonic words that was recorded in the process of creating a wallet
Confirm failed，please examine your mnemonic words
Make sure your mnemonic word is safe.
Please make sure that the following wallet mnemonic word has been saved and properly kept for retrieving the wallet created this time.
Touch the screen to generate new mnemonic word
An error generates while executing the instruction
Press again for exiting from the system
The inside address has been copied to the pasteboard
No sufficient funds, please reenter the amount
This page shows that trade processing is completed, but does not represent the success of this trade, and the specific trade status is inquired in the trade information list.
An optimum expense fee has been chosen for you. A higher fee could speed up the process.
Service charge cannot be less than one in a million
Are you sure to skip this step?
Do not skip this step for your wallet safety
The name of the wallet can not be empty
The wallet is being restoring, please wait patiently
The wallet can not be restored.\n\n%1$s
The camera can not be accessed
Password does not match，please try again
Network access exception, please try again later
Please allow the invocation of system camera

Release the android version for closed test: which includes the following functions: 

 1. support the creation and restoration of wallet 
2. Create the wallet based on mnemonic word 
 3. Support the basic functions of wallet: payments receipts, linkman, information, trade records and details.
This function is not yet available
The password is made up of six digits
There are no transaction records to show
Please enter the nickname or address
This is your address and private key of your Anybit wallet. Tick them to copy.
Caution! Anyone that has your address and private key can control all related assets. Do not share them.
Caution!Please confirm that you have backed up your wallet mnemonic in case you lose your assets.
Forget your wallet password? You can reset password by using mnemonic or private key.
WeCredit is a safe Blockchain wallet.
Warning:Export plain private key is very dangerous.We recommend you backup with menmonic or keystore.
Please check around if you are being watched by someone or hidden cameras.
Two dimensional code prohibits screenshots, photos and saves. Please ensure that you can directly scan in a safe environment to import wallets.
Confirmed!Do you want to remove the mnemonic from this device
Please choose mnemonic words in order and make sure the words are correct.
The Mnemonic words are for recovering your wallet,write down correctly on peper and keep in a safe place.
We highly recommend you write the Mnemonic words(Backup Phrase) on paper and keep it in a safe place,anyone get it can access or spend your assets.
At least 8 characters,better to mix letters,digits,symbols.
Password strength is critical to guard your wallet.We can not recover the password,please backup cautiously.
Please enter the amount of money
The transfer has been submitted. Please wait for the miners to deal with it
Please click the currency page to check the result of the transfer
Please use space to separate the mnemonic words
Please set up the password for the wallet

After creating a wallet,you need to backup mnemonic phrase.A mnemonic phrase is a human readable encrypted private key.Anyone with your menomonic words can access or spend your assets!
Attention:
1. Please do not screenshot to save the mnemonic phrase.
2. Check mnemonic phrase.
3.Please write down on paper and keep it safe.

It is the secret half of your address and is a string of 64 hexadecimal characters. Anyone with your private key can access or spend your assets! 
 Attention: 
1. Please do not screenshot to save the private key. 
2.Please write down on paper and keep it safe,try not to put it in a networking device.

A Keystore file is an encrypted version of your private key. It is an encryption of your private key that is protected by a password of your choosing.Password is the same important with the keystore.If you forget the private,you will lost your assets.

Transfer 
In WeCredit wallet,choose the token in the assets page that you want to send,and input the receiver is address,amount,mining fee and password. 
Receive 
In WeCredit wallet,choose the token in the assets page that you want to receive,copy your address,and send it to others.Or you can send QR code to others.

Mining fee is not enough.Make sure mining fee is enough to send the transaction. \nTimeout.It will be timeout when encounter crowed network,you can go to the browser to make sure it is succeed or failed,and try send again.
I forget my password,what is next?

When you create wallet,you set the password. 
WeCredit does not save password.You can import the mnemonic phrase to set new password. 
Reset password:Profile-Wallet Tools-Change Password-Import. 
Your assets can't be found if you forget mnemonic.
Please backup mnemonic words in the wallet\'s creating process.Please write down and save it safely.Anyone with your menomonic words can access or spend your assets!

Method:In the page of Profle-Wallet Tools,you can export private key.Please write down on paper and keep it safe,try not to put it in a networking device.Anyone with your private key words can access or spend your assets!
How to import an existing wallet?

In the page of Profle-Wallet Tools,you can import wallet by menomonic words,keystore or private key. 
By menomonic,input menomonic words,and set new password. 
By keystore,paste keystore file ,and input the password. 
By private key,paste private key,and set new password

In the page of Profile-Wallet Tools,verify your password and wallet can be deleted. \nAttention! WeCredit does not store mnemonic.Please backup mnemonic before you delete wallets,otherwise,you will lose your assets.
Click Create Wallet button in WeCredit,and set password.Please backup mnemonic words.

Dear User,

Welcome to using WeCredit! 

Please be sure to read carefully and understand the WeCredit Terms of Service( "the Agreement") to ensure that you fully understand the terms of this agreement. 
I Confirmation and Acceptance of the Agreement 
1.When you download the WeCredit and create or import wallet, it is deemed that you have fully read and accepted all the terms of this agreement. This agreement will become effective immediately and binding upon both parties. 
2.If you are under 18 years old, or a person with no capacity for civil conduct or a person restricting civil conduct, please use WeCredit under the guidance of parents or guardians. 
II Service 
WeCredit provides services for creating or importing wallet, sending and receiving, transaction records, information, etc., and other WeCredit considers necessary. The following questions should be understood by the user when accepting the above service. 
1.Because of the feature of blockchain :peer to peer,protecting the security of your assets, 
WeCredit does not provide following services: 
(1)store user password,private key,mnemonic,keystore; 
(2)restore user password,private key,mnemonic,keystore; 
2.Users should backup password,private key,mnemonic,keystore by themselves.If password,private key,mnemonic,keystore is lost,WeCredit does not provide recover the wallet,password,private key,mnemonic,keystore. 
3.When the user transfers / receives, please confirm the transaction address. Based on the irreversible property of the blockchain, if the address is incorrect, WeCredit cannot help cancel the transaction. 
4.Please keep your wallet password, private key, mnemonic, keystore. It is suggested that you copy your mnemonic, keystore and other information, not through the screenshots, WeChat, SMS and other networking methods to save. 
5.In the use of the process, please be alert to unofficial fraud, if you find this kind of behavior,can contact us. 
6. When you use this product, please comply with the laws and regulations of your country or region.
You need to update the application to use\n\n
wallet exists,do you want to replace with the new password?
The password can not be empty
Please agree to the privacy clause
Error of the mnemonic words, please retype
I have read it carefully and have agreed
Remove the success of the help word
1.Creat,Import and backup wallet;\n2.Support the basic functions of wallet:transfering,receiving and details of transactions.
Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
